metadata.Title: CVE-2022-40476 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: A null pointer dereference issue was discovered in fs/io_uring.c in the Linux kernel before 5.15.62. A local user could use this flaw to crash the system or potentially cause a denial of service.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
